data.comment: The match is underway at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 2, Sapporo drives forward and Anderson Lopes gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Tosu.
In the minute 5, Free kick for Sapporo in the half of Tosu.
Daiki Miya (Tosu) has received a first yellow card.
Anderson Lopes (Sapporo) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tosu.
In the minute 7, Tosu's An Yong-Woo misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Sapporo goal kick.
In Tosu a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 10, Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
Koichiro Fukushima awards Tosu a goal kick.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Tosu in their own half.
In the minute 15, Tosu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tosu to take a throw-in in Sapporo territory.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a Sapporo throw-in in Tosu's half.
In the minute 17, Can Sapporo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tosu's half?
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Sapporo in their own half.
Ball safe as Tosu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 21, Free kick Tosu.
Corner awarded to Sapporo.
Sapporo's Ryosuke Shindo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 23, Tosu have a goal kick.
Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
Sapporo's Anderson Lopes gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Tosu defender.
In the minute 30, In Tosu, Chanathip Songkrasin of Sapporo is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Throw-in for Tosu in their own half.
Tosu drive upfield and An Yong-Woo gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Sapporo defender.
In the minute 32, Sapporo have a dangerous throw-in.
Tomoki Takamine for Sapporo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Tosu at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
In Tosu a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Tosu in the half of Sapporo.
In the minute 34, Daiki Suga (Sapporo) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 35, Tosu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Tosu at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
Ball goes out of play for a Sapporo goal kick.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Tosu in the half of Sapporo.
Tosu's Shinya Nakano gets in a shot on goal at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Chanathip Songkrasin (Sapporo) gets in a great strike â€“ straight into the post! Ohhhh so close!
In the minute 40, Koichiro Fukushima awards Tosu a goal kick.
Chanathip Songkrasin for Sapporo drives towards goal at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Sapporo have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
In the minute 43, Throw-in high up the field for Sapporo in Tosu.
Tosu have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
Sapporo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Tosu have a goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Tosu needs to be cautious. Sapporo have an attacking throw-in.
Koichiro Fukushima awards the home team a throw-in.
Ryoya Morishita is replacing Shinya Nakano for Tosu at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
Michael Petrovic is making the team's first substitution at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium with Takuro Kaneko replacing Chanathip Songkrasin.
Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
In the minute 48, Throw-in Tosu.
Can Sapporo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tosu's half?
In Tosu Sapporo attack through Anderson Lopes. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 49, It's a goal kick for the home team in Tosu.
In Tosu Sapporo drive forward through Tomoki Takamine. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Tosu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 52, Free kick Tosu.
Sapporo's Tomoki Takamine breaks free at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Tosu at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
In the minute 58, Corner awarded to Sapporo.
Corner awarded to Sapporo.
Throw-in for Tosu at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Sapporo close to the penalty box.
Myung Hwi Kim (Tosu) is making a second substitution, with Daichi Hayashi replacing An Yong-Woo.
Goal! Yoshiaki Komai gives Sapporo a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 61, That's a fine assist from Ryosuke Shindo.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Tosu just outside Sapporo's area.
Yoshiaki Komai (Sapporo) shoots â€“ and rattles the crossbar!
In the minute 65, Koichiro Fukushima awards the home team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Douglas is replacing Daiki Suga for the away team.
In the minute 66, Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Tosu in their own half.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a throw-in for Tosu, close to Sapporo's area.
Goal! Anderson Lopes extends Sapporo's lead to 0-2.
In the minute 66, Great play from Douglas to set up the goal.
Jeong-su Park is on a sub for Keisuke Iwashita for Tosu.
The home team have replaced Yoshiki Takahashi with Riki Harakawa. This is the fifth substitution made today by Myung Hwi Kim.
In the minute 69, Anderson Lopes is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Sapporo make their third substitution with Shunta Tanaka replacing Yoshiaki Komai.
Sapporoâ€™s Anderson Lopes is on his feet again at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
In the minute 71, Free kick for Sapporo in their own half.
Sapporo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a throw-in for Sapporo, close to Tosu's area.
In the minute 73, Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Tosu.
Free kick Sapporo.
The home team replace Cho Dong-geon with Yohei Toyoda.
In the minute 74, It's a goal kick for the away team in Tosu.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Sapporo in their own half.
Free kick for Tosu in the half of Sapporo.
In the minute 76, Sapporo's Anderson Lopes breaks free at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Tosu goal kick.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Sapporo close to the penalty box.
In the minute 77, Koichiro Fukushima awards Sapporo a goal kick.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a Sapporo throw-in in Tosu's half.
Tosu have a goal kick.
In the minute 80, In Tosu Sapporo's Anderson Lopes is caught offside.
In Tosu Sapporo attack through Anderson Lopes. The finish is off target, however.
Tosu have a goal kick.
In the minute 82, Takuma Arano of Sapporo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Can Sapporo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tosu's half?
Free kick in a good position for Sapporo!
In the minute 85, Anderson Lopes for the away team is judged to be offside.
Sapporo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Takuro Kaneko for Sapporo has been booked by Koichiro Fukushima and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 88, In Tosu a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Tosu to take a throw-in in Sapporo territory.
Koichiro Fukushima awards Sapporo a goal kick.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Tosu in their own half.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Tosu.
Sapporo are pushing forward but Douglas's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Tosu goal kick.
The match is over. Final score 0-2.
The away team have replaced Anderson Lopes with Ryota Hayasaka. This is the fourth substitution made today by Michael Petrovic.
